nodes.bodyText: can we keep this in the 0.13.x branch shouldnt prevent the upgrade, right?
it was conflicting at places with the one from quarkus
let me do another green build without this, I'll merge this one and then try and revert it with another PR (I am having issues locally and I don't understand if they are related to this)
